name: Contact : Last Defence
description: Contact : Last Defence is a VR space action shooter. Complete missions, protect your planet and upgrade your ship. When you are done defending, take the fight to the invaders in Arcade mode and compete for a top spot on the online leaderboard!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit SP1 or newer Processor: Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1600 MB available space Additional Notes: VR Only
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit SP1 or newer Processor: Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1600 MB available space Additional Notes: VR Only
